name: EyeGuardian
description: EyeGuardian helps you maintain healthy eyes while working on your Mac with the scientifically proven 20-20-20 rule: Every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds. This simple practice reduces eye strain, prevents dry eyes, and helps maintain focus during long work sessions.

name: EventCountDownPro
description: Track birthdays, holidays, deadlines, trips, and all your important dates with beautiful, customizable countdowns. Whether it's a wedding day, vacation, project deadline, or just counting down to the weekend – EventCountdownPro helps you visualize the time remaining and stay organized.

name: Internet Speed Meter
description: Internet Speed Meter is a sleek, lightweight menu bar application that gives you instant visibility into your internet data usage with beautiful visualizations and real-time statistics. Perfect for users with data caps, remote workers, or anyone who wants to optimize their network performance.

name: iSystem Monitor
description: Effortlessly monitor your Mac's performance in real-time with iSystem Monitor – the elegant, lightweight system monitoring tool that lives in your menu bar. iSystem Monitor provides comprehensive insights into your Mac's vital performance metrics without cluttering your desktop. Designed for both casual users and professionals who need to keep an eye on system resources, this powerful utility delivers the information you need with just a single click.
